subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The oddsmaker at Churchill Downs, Mike Battaglia, made Brother Derek, the winner of four straight, the 3-1 favorite in the 132nd running of America's most famous horse race.
snippet: The oddsmaker at Churchill Downs, Mike Battaglia, made Brother Derek, the winner of four straight, the 3-1 favorite in the 132nd running of America's most famous horse race.
